mapper.select: select no, title, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, id, hit from qna order by no desc
select no, title, content, id, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, hit from qna where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(no, title, content, id) values(qna_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{id})
insert into qna(no, title, content) values(#{no},#{title},#{content})
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
